name: Matry's Room
description:
[INSTRUCTIONS FOR BROWSER VERSION BELOW]

You wake up in a strange room with no memory. There is no door or window, no apparent exit. Your only hope of escape is the Matryoshka doll in front of you.

WELCOME TO MATRY'S ROOM

Try to escape in this surreal point-and-click puzzle game with a dark backstory and 5 different endings. 

Uncover your memories through the many layers of the mysterious Matryoshka doll, also known as the Russian doll.

Will you find the salvation you seek for?

FOR BROWSER VERSION

This game uses Ren'Py, whose browser version is still in BETA. Some animations might not work. For best experience, please use the DOWNLOADABLE versions.

If you are getting an error message about the DATABASE, please verify whether you have enabled 3rd-party cookies or try using a different browser.

HOW TO USE FULLSCREEN ON BROWSER:

  1. Go to the game's Preferences.
  2. Click on Fullscreen.
  3. Click anywhere in the game window. You'll be in fullscreen.
  4. To exit, go to Preferences.
  5. Click Window. You'll exit fullscreen.

DO NOT USE ITCH'S EXIT OPTION.

DISCLAIMER: This game might contain sensitive content, flashing lights, and loud sounds. There is no graphic depiction of gore apart from blood and skulls. There is also no jump-scare or screaming.

WALKTHROUGH

Code, story, sound, and art by Button Cupcake using free-for-commercial-use fonts

Game made within one weekend for The Indie Tales Jam with its "One Room" theme

Thank you for playing! Feel free to leave your thoughts in the comment section.
